TR.A.L.I.C.
Overview About Logout

TR.A.L.I.C.

The TR.A.L.I.C., short for Trash and Leaf Intelligent Collector, is an IoT automated robot that intelligently picks up trash and leaves with its built-in claw and vacuum, revolutionizing the way waste management is approached. Equipped with advanced sensors and algorithms, it can seamlessly navigate various environments, including parks and backyards to identify and collect litter efficiently and effectively.
